text: Kathleen Harrison (aka Colleen Moore; August 19, 1899 â€“ January 25, 1988) was an American movie actress. She had most of her success in the silent era. Moore played Ruth in The Bad Boy. She also played Mary in Her Bridal Nightmare. Her career lasted until 1934. From 1928 to 1935, Moore worked with about 100 people to make a very small "Fairy Castle." It is now a regular exhibit at The Museum of Science and Industry in Chicago. Moore was born in Port Huron, Michigan. She died of cancer in Paso Robles, California at 88. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Michigan Category:1899 births Category:1988 deaths
title: Colleen Moore
